name: ONLY ART CAN SAVE US - SCAVENGER HUNT

metadata.name: Only Art Can Save Us
metadata.description:
Embark on a quest, where mystery's in store.  
Find three words in each of four.  
The puzzle they form, unlocks a great prize.  
But first, five editions must rise.

So search with care, and let your mind roam.  
Find the words that lead you to the unknown.  
Use your wit and knowledge as your guide.  
And let the story unfold, with each step you stride.

So go forth, adventurer, let the journey begin.  
Find the words that lead you to win.
